https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/fo6YgVlipY8YDmvem7UG1GbulxI.jpg Accomplishing her late husband's wish of remaining a mysterious neon sign, a depressed middle-aged widow and the neon signmaker's protégé discover surprises and bitterness amidst the city's vanishing glow. A Light Never Goes Out
